capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've always found his... unique approach to teaching quite fascinating, and his expertise in potions is unmatched.

I've had my fair share of run-ins with Professor Snape, and I have to say, he's a bit of a complicated character. As the Potion-Teacher, he's definitely an expert in his field, but his... prickly demeanor can make it difficult for some students to get along with him.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that I can confirm.

Ron is 11 years old, and I think that's really young to be starting school. I'm not sure if it's a good idea for kids to start learning so early, but at the same time, I know some parents want their kids to get a head start on their education.

Ron is 11 years old, you know. I think it's pretty cool that he's still in elementary school, but at the same time, I'm a bit worried about how fast he's growing up. (CERTAINTY: medium) (POLARITY: neutral) (SENTIMENT: cautious) (EMOTION: concerned)
Ron is 11 years old, you know. I think it's pretty cool that he's still so young and full of energy. (CERTAINTY: high POLARITY: positive SENTIMENT: neutral EMOTION: excitement)
